item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, January 27, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Oliver Heaviside and the theory of transmission lines (2021) (117 points | 26 comments)
2. My failed attempt to shrink all NPM packages by 5% (113 points | 49 comments)
3. Show HN: I Made an iOS Podcast Player with Racket (20 points | 3 comments)
4. SiFive's P550 Microarchitecture (51 points | 11 comments)
5. A layoff fundamentally changed how I perceive work (444 points | 404 comments)
6. Show HN: Making AR experiences is still painful – had to make my own editor (108 points | 22 comments)
7. Openhaystack: Build 'AirTags' – track Bluetooth devices via Apple's network (336 points | 68 comments)
8. Hedy: Textual programming made easy (145 points | 49 comments)
9. C Is Not Suited to SIMD (2019) (32 points | 26 comments)
10. Lessons in creating family photos that people want to keep (2018) (280 points | 109 comments)
11. UK first as vertical rocket launch licence granted (15 points | 3 comments)
12. Supercharge SQLite with Ruby Functions (99 points | 31 comments)
13. Hard numbers in the Wayland vs. X11 input latency discussion (517 points | 396 comments)
14. Show HN: Bagels – TUI expense tracker (193 points | 61 comments)
15. Using generative AI as part of historical research: three case studies (226 points | 191 comments)
16. Microplastics block blood flow in the brain, mouse study reveals (83 points | 23 comments)
17. Qwen2.5-1M: Deploy your own Qwen with context length up to 1M tokens (245 points | 89 comments)
18. Show HN: 3D printing giant things with a Python jigsaw generator (139 points | 29 comments)
19. So you wanna write Kubernetes controllers? (184 points | 95 comments)
20. Using the most unhinged AVX-512 instruction to make fastest phrase search algo (184 points | 46 comments)
21. How DeepSeek-R1 Was Built, for Dummies (16 points | discuss)
22. The impact of competition and DeepSeek on Nvidia (310 points | 162 comments)
23. Shunpo: Minimalist bash tool to make directory navigation a little bit faster (89 points | 33 comments)
24. Halliday AR(Not?)/AI Glasses (15 points | 7 comments)
25. Autodesk partially restores old forum posts (83 points | 21 comments)
26. Marginalia – A search engine that prioritizes non-commercial content (451 points | 54 comments)
27. No one is disrupting banks – at least not the big ones (167 points | 288 comments)
28. Amsterdam Compiler Kit for Cray X-MP (83 points | 10 comments)
29. Show HN: A new native app for 20 year old OS X (130 points | 23 comments)
30. The Microsoft 365 Copilot launch was a disaster (497 points | 480 comments)
